tag_list: omaha, nebraska, internet, communications, social, media, networking, consulting
overview:
Joe Craig is the Founder of SourceBurst, an Omaha, Nebraska based Internet firm launched in August of 2001 with the mission of connecting small businesses and non-profits with open source software solutions.

A decade later, SourceBurst continues to empower businesses, organizations and individuals through open source solutions, with a focus on hosting environments supportive of content management systems that empower our clients.
